Find us

Our track, workshop and club house are all located in Ridgeway Park, Chinford, London This is the site where public running in the summer months takes place; see our running dates for full details. In the winter months we hold our meetings in st edmons church in South Chingford.

By Public Transport

The club is served by two local buses, 97 and 215. These buses link up with Chingford Mount and North Chingford Bus Termi. Chingford London Overground Station (Zone 5) is only a 15 minute walk away down the plesent Chingfordâ€™s Station Road High Street. Alowing the club to be 45 minutes from the centre of London on public transport.

By Car

We are situated near the A406 (North Circular) and the M11. The postcode for the club is E4 6XU. Ridgeway Park has a small car park off of Peel Close which is a side road to the main A112 (Old Church Road).
